source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_SEQ_00<tab>The adventurers of Revenant's Toll have an initiation rite involving smelly seedkin, a proud tradition that only Aganbold appears to know about.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_SEQ_00<tab>レヴナンツトールの冒険者アガンボルドは、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の腕を試そうとしている。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_SEQ_01<tab>Aganbold insists that in order to be recognized as an adventurer at Revenant's Toll, you must pass the test. This is news to you, but since your schedule allows it, go west into the Tangle and slay three morbols.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_SEQ_01<tab>レヴナンツトールで冒険者として活動するには、ある儀式を通過する必要があるらしい。レヴナンツトール西の「タングル湿林」で「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F0ED01 /var>」を3匹討伐してこよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_SEQ_02<tab>The ill-tempered seedkin are dead and Eorzea is better for it. Speak with Aganbold, who will no doubt be satisfied, and cease holding forth in a manner most theatrical.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F0ED01 /var>を討伐した。レヴナンツトールに戻って「アガンボルド」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_SEQ_03<tab>Your hopes are dashed. If anything, Aganbold grows louder and more florid as he declares that you must now slay the mortal enemy of Revenant's Toll. Lurk at the ambush point and slay this Morbolger when it appears.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_SEQ_03<tab>次に戦う相手は、レヴナンツトールの冒険者の宿敵だという。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D2501 /var>」で待機し、現れた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207D701 /var>」を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_SEQ_04<tab>The Morbolger is dead, as is possibly your sense of smell. Lest your sensory sacrifices be in vain, report your success to Aganbold and bring this trial to an end.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207D701 /var>を討伐した。レヴナンツトールに戻って「アガンボルド」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_SEQ_05<tab>Aganbold declares you one of the adventurers of Revenant's Toll, and returns to speaking in a normal tone of voice. Your relief outweighs any suspicion you may entertain that you have been cozened in some way...
target: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_SEQ_05<tab>アガンボルドに認めてもらうことができた。これで、レヴナンツトールで活動しやすくなるだろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_TODO_02<tab>Lurk at the ambush spot and slay the Morbolger.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_TODO_02<tab>指定地点で待機し、現れた<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207D701 /var>を討伐

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_000<tab>I speak for the confraternity of 'venturers who call Revenant's Toll home. Take heed, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We have a common foe! A hated enemy! A fierce adversary! And its name is─morbol!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_000俺らレヴナンツトールで活動する冒険者にとって、
最強にして最大の宿敵……それが、モルボルだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_001<tab><var 08 E905 ((Sister)) ((Brother)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You hate this enemy!? Does your heart yearn to slay it!? Then do so, <var 08 E905 ((sister)) ((brother)) /var>! Go and slay three!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_001誰もが嫌い、憎むモルボルを、お前に倒してきてもらうぜ。
そうさな……3匹ほど倒せば十分だろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_002<tab>This is a rite of passage, <var 08 E905 ((Sister)) ((Brother)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! If you're to be part of Revenant's Toll, we must know: do you ring true?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_002……こいつは儀式さ。
お前をレヴナンツトールの一員に迎えるためのな。
まずは力試し、ちゃっちゃと片付けてこい！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_020<tab>Hear ye, hear all! The morbols are slain...and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has passed the <var 1A 02 /var>first<var 1A 01 /var> test of Revenant's Toll 'venturers! What, you didn't think it would just be <var 1A 02 /var>one<var 1A 01 /var> test, did you?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_020おう、モルボルを討伐できたみたいだな。
だが安心するのはまだ早ぇ。
ここまでなら、もう何人もたどり着いてるんだからな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_021<tab>The next trial is...by combat! Face our nemesis─the enemy to sing our threnody, the foe to tag our big toe! See you where I placed the mark on your map? Return alive, <var 08 E905 ((sister)) ((brother)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_021次は、レヴナンツトールの冒険者の宿敵を相手にしてもらう。
お前の地図に印をつけておいたから、そこへ向かえ。
……必ず生きて帰ってくるんだぜ！
TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_DUMMY_000_030<tab>「指定地点」にアクセスし、ポップする「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207D701 /var>」を倒す。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_040<tab>Aaand the fearsome Morbolger falls to the newest brave of the Revenant's Toll 'Venturers' Guild─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Welcome to the confraternity, <var 08 E905 ((sister)) ((brother)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_040まさか、最強の敵「」を倒すとは……！
お前の力、認めないわけにはいかねぇな！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_041<tab>Seriously, how'd you kill that thing? That Morbolger was something else. They say it started off as an escaped pet. Guess that's what you get when <var 1A 02 /var>spoiled rotten<var 1A 01 /var> meets <var 1A 02 /var>red in tooth and claw<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_041奴はかつて、物好きな貴族が愛玩用に飼っていたモルボルだ。
先祖返りしたとかで飼い主のもとから逃げだし、
あのとおり凶暴化してたってわけさ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_042<tab>That thing slew more 'venturers with its charnel breath than a whole parade of gigas. Not that I wanted you dead exactly, you understand, but folk have been known not to come back.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_042舐めてかかって、死んじまった冒険者は数知れず。
俺の尊敬していた冒険者も、
こいつの息の臭さに引退を決めたほどだ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_043<tab>Well, that's all in the past, eh, <var 08 E905 ((Sister)) ((Brother)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You're one of the Revenant's Toll 'venturers now. Death to morbols!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_AGANBOLD_000_043だが、それも今日で終わりさ。
今日からお前は、レヴナンツトールの一員だ。
いっしょに、この拠点を盛りあげていこうぜ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC509_00997_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>Your eyes water and your senses swim!
